XmlRecord - Class in org.easybatch.xml
A record in a xml file.
XmlRecord(Header, String) - Constructor for class org.easybatch.xml.XmlRecord
 
XmlRecordMapper<T> - Class in org.easybatch.xml
A record mapper that maps xml records to domain objects annotated with JaxB2 annotations.
XmlRecordMapper(Class<? extends T>) - Constructor for class org.easybatch.xml.XmlRecordMapper
Creates an XmlRecordMapper.
XmlRecordMapper(Class<? extends T>, File) - Constructor for class org.easybatch.xml.XmlRecordMapper
Creates an XmlRecordMapper.
XmlRecordMapper(Unmarshaller) - Constructor for class org.easybatch.xml.XmlRecordMapper
A constructor that let's you preconfigure the unmarshaller (with custom adapter, custom listener, etc) to be used by the Xml record mapper.
XmlRecordReader - Class in org.easybatch.xml
A record reader that reads xml records from an xml stream.
XmlRecordReader(String, InputStream) - Constructor for class org.easybatch.xml.XmlRecordReader
 
XstreamRecordMapper<T> - Class in org.easybatch.integration.xstream
Mapper that uses XStream to map XML records to domain objects.
XstreamRecordMapper(XStream) - Constructor for class org.easybatch.integration.xstream.XstreamRecordMapper
